inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 6, "index": 12}, {"type": "bedrock", "quantity": 34, "index": 21}, {"type": "bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 20, "index": 32}, {"type": "oak_fence_gate", "quantity": 11, "index": 36}, {"type": "crimson_slab", "quantity": 54, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft stone_stairs, I first need to craft stone. Stone can be crafted by smelting cobblestone. Therefore, I will smelt the cobblestone at slot 12 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 12 to slot 11 with quantity 1
